This vignette shows how `pls_fit()` dispatches automatically.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(bigPLSR)
set.seed(1)
n <- 200; p <- 50
X <- matrix(rnorm(n*p), n, p)
y <- X[,1]*2 - X[,2] + rnorm(n)

# Dense path
fit1 <- pls_fit(X, y, ncomp = 3, scores = "r")

# Big-memory path
bmX <- bigmemory::as.big.matrix(X)
bmy <- bigmemory::as.big.matrix(matrix(y, n, 1))
fit2 <- pls_fit(bmX, bmy, ncomp = 3, backend = "bigmem", scores = "big")
```
